segments.text: There's just one catch . Zina asked me to let you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She promised that we'd be ready to start tracking the Stars.com web site by the end of next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ! ? It'll be a miracle if we're ready by the end of the month ! Is she crazy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I think she is just a little bit crazy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Crazy is too kind . Insane is more like it . Nuts ! Wacko ! Psycho !
segments.speaker: S2
